verses.text: \w In|strong="H4428"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* Amraphel \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Shinar|strong="H8152"\w*, Arioch \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ellasar, \w Chedorlaomer|strong="H3540"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Tidal|strong="H8413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Goiim|strong="H1471"\w*

\w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H4421"\w* \w Bera|strong="H1298"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \w Birsha|strong="H1306"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*, \w Shinab|strong="H8134"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Admah, \w Shemeber|strong="H8038"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zeboiim|strong="H6636"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Zoar|strong="H6820"\w*).

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* latter five \w came|strong="H2266"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w allies|strong="H2266"\w* \w to|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w Siddim|strong="H7708"\w* (\w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*).

\w For|strong="H8141"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w they|strong="H8141"\w* \w had|strong="H7969"\w* \w been|strong="H5647"\w* \w subject|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H8141"\w* \w Chedorlaomer|strong="H3540"\w*, \w but|strong="H5647"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w they|strong="H8141"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w Chedorlaomer|strong="H3540"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* allied \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* out \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w defeated|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Rephaites|strong="H7497"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Ashteroth-karnaim|strong="H6255"\w*, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* Zuzites \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Ham|strong="H1990"\w*, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* Emites \w in|strong="H8141"\w* Shaveh-kiriathaim,

\w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Horites|strong="H2752"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w area|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* El-paran, \w which|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H4057"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* invade \w En-mishpat|strong="H5880"\w* (\w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*), \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w conquered|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w territory|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w*, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorites \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Hazazon-tamar|strong="H2688"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*, \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Admah, \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zeboiim|strong="H6636"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Zoar|strong="H6820"\w*) \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w arrayed|strong="H6186"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6186"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Siddim|strong="H7708"\w*

\w against|strong="H1471"\w* \w Chedorlaomer|strong="H3540"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, \w Tidal|strong="H8413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Goiim|strong="H1471"\w*, Amraphel \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Shinar|strong="H8152"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Arioch \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ellasar—four \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w against|strong="H1471"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Siddim|strong="H7708"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* full \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w tar|strong="H2564"\w* \w pits|strong="H5127"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w as|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, \w some|strong="H8033"\w* men \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w pits|strong="H5127"\w*, \w but|strong="H7604"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w survivors|strong="H7604"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* four kings \w seized|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w goods|strong="H7399"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* food, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1121"\w* \w carried|strong="H3212"\w* off Abram’s \w nephew|strong="H1121"\w* \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w possessions|strong="H7399"\w*, since \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*.

Then an escapee came \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H5046"\w* Abram \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w*. Now Abram \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w living|strong="H7931"\w* near \w the|strong="H5046"\w* Oaks \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w Mamre|strong="H4471"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* Amorite, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* brother \w of|strong="H1167"\w* Eshcol \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w Aner|strong="H6063"\w*, \w all|strong="H7931"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w bound|strong="H1167"\w* \w by|strong="H1167"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \w to|strong="H5046"\w* Abram.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Abram \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* relative \w had|strong="H3588"\w* been \w captured|strong="H7617"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* mobilized \w the|strong="H8085"\w* 318 \w trained|strong="H2593"\w* \w men|strong="H2593"\w* \w born|strong="H3211"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w set|strong="H1835"\w* \w out|strong="H7324"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w pursuit|strong="H7291"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.

During \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w Abram|strong="H2505"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* forces \w and|strong="H5650"\w* routed Chedorlaomer’s army, \w pursuing|strong="H7291"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Hobah|strong="H2327"\w*, \w north|strong="H8040"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* retrieved \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w goods|strong="H7399"\w*, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* relative \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w possessions|strong="H7399"\w*, \w together|strong="H1571"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* women \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w After|strong="H3318"\w* \w Abram|strong="H7725"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w defeating|strong="H5221"\w* \w Chedorlaomer|strong="H3540"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* allied \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Shaveh|strong="H7740"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w*).

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Melchizedek|strong="H4442"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Salem|strong="H8004"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*—since \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w*—

\w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w he|strong="H1288"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* Abram \w and|strong="H8064"\w* said: “\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* Abram \w by|strong="H8064"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w*, \w Creator|strong="H7069"\w* \w of|strong="H8064"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3027"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H5414"\w* Abram \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Melchizedek|strong="H4042"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H4643"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* said \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Abram, “\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5315"\w*, \w but|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w goods|strong="H7399"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5315"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* Abram replied \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w raised|strong="H7311"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H7311"\w*, \w Creator|strong="H7069"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*,

\w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thread|strong="H2339"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strap|strong="H8288"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sandal|strong="H5275"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, lest \w you|strong="H3605"\w* should say, ‘\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H6238"\w* Abram \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*.’

\w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w will|strong="H5288"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1107"\w* \w but|strong="H7535"\w* what \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* eaten \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w share|strong="H2506"\w* \w for|strong="H2506"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*—\w Aner|strong="H6063"\w*, Eshcol, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Mamre|strong="H4471"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w may|strong="H5288"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*.”
